item.description: The concert will feature the former lead singer of Journey from 1998 - 2006 singing Journey’s biggest hits, "Don’t Stop Believin," "Anyway You Want It," "Lovin Touchin Squeezin," "Separate Ways," " Ask the Lonely," "Higher Place," "Lights," "Faithfully," "Stone in Love," "Wheel in the Sky," "Kiss Me Softly" and "All the Way.”  A concert you do not want to miss :-)
item.why: Second concert in Hamdens concert series that you don't want to miss :-) we will groove to the music of Journey as we share a bottle of wine and some of our favorite munchies with friends :-)

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: The Steve Augeri Band (Former lead singer of Journey "CONCERT ON THE GREEN"
